sentences.english: It concludes with a perspective on naming in information management.

sentences.english: As a result, we develop an information managing software named KSD.

sentences.english: As a simple system for content management, blogs are invaluable.

sentences.english: Most Indian firms work on IT projects for back offices, information management systems for their various business processes, said Hsu.
sentences.chinese: 多数印度公司从事后台IT支持和信息管理，许说。

sentences.english: Information management has a long history.
The application of the Data Warehouse(DW)technology in financial information management is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨数据仓库技术在金融信息管理方面的应用。

sentences.english: An effective information-management policy must support both kinds of users.
sentences.chinese: 有效的信息管理策略必须同时支持这两种类型的用户。

sentences.english: The value depends upon the expert strength to grasp the peacetime and wartime union the information management.
sentences.chinese: 重视依靠专家力量把握平战结合的信息管理。

sentences.english: It reflected an information management the catholicity and the society of the activity.
sentences.chinese: 它反映了信息管理活动的普遍性和社会性。

sentences.english: Richard, a teacher from Australia, gained a Master Degree of information Management in the University of New South Wales.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲籍教师，新南威尔士大学信息管理学硕士。

sentences.english: Information management software is at the core of enterprise computing.
sentences.chinese: 信息管理软件是企业计算的核心。

sentences.english: This article provides the concrete develop process of declaring information management module.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出了申报书信息管理模块的具体实现过程。

sentences.english: Presentation is often the most-overlooked aspect of information management.
sentences.chinese: 信息的表示通常是信息管理中最容易被忽略的方面。
